p: A different approach was used to evaluate another aspect of WBM, namely as a food rich in prebiotics. Health effects and the gut microbiota were assessed in an open-label crossover trial by subjecting 32 healthy adults to the consumption of protein-matched amounts of mushrooms or meat twice daily for ten days [ 115]. No differences were found between the two groups in breath hydrogen, stool frequency, consistency, fecal pH, or Short Chain Fatty Acid (SCFA) concentrations.
